6.modification: modify: add an extra validation-and-formatting ensemble step using AnswerGenerate on the concatenation of direct and step outputs, and include a short extraction post-processing to force concise numeric or named answers. Changes under 5 lines in __call__.

5.modification: modify: Add validation, stricter answer extraction, and a short voting step using simple frequency count; limited changes (<=5 lines) to __call__ to include normalization and fallback numeric-extraction. Also add a new concise CHAIN_PROMPT variant and keep DIRECT_PROMPT. Changes: - normalize candidate answers by stripping extraneous text and extracting numeric tokens when possible; - add simple voting before sc_ens when candidates are numeric; modified lines are inline in graph.

2.modification: modify: Added an AnswerGenerate operator call and a ScEnsemble aggregation; updated __call__ to run two different custom prompts (direct answer and step-by-step), then use AnswerGenerate to produce thought+answer, and ScEnsemble to vote between multiple runs. Also added minimal error handling and preserved tools/tool_functions properties. Changed at most 5 lines in core code logic (async __call__ body adjusted).

3.modification: Modified __call__ to run two different custom prompts (direct answer and step-by-step), call AnswerGenerate to produce thought+answer, then call ScEnsemble to pick final response. Added use of the AnswerGenerate and ScEnsemble operators, preserved tools/tool_functions properties. Changed 4 lines in async __call__ body and added import typing for List, Dict, Callable. Kept changes minimal.

8.modification: modify: add one stricter EXTRACT_PROMPT to normalize numeric-only answers and prefer single-token; change small post-process normalization (replace commas with semicolons and ensure single token/numeric-only). (Modified lines <=5)

7.modification: modify: add a validation+extraction postprocessing step that enforces short-format final answers (prefer numeric or single-token or semicolon-separated tokens), add a third Custom prompt for an "EXTRACT_PROMPT" to ask the model to output only the final concise answer in a normalized format; integrate AnswerGenerate on that extract output and use ScEnsemble over four candidates (direct, step, combined, extract) and ensure final never None. Changed <=5 lines in __call__ to add new call and include in ensemble list and improved final selection logic.

10.modification: Modified: added a focused EXTRACT_NAME_PROMPT and one extra Custom call to produce a single-token normalized candidate (name-only) and integrated its result into the ensemble; tightened postprocessing to prefer exact token matches from that extraction. Changes limited to adding one prompt and <=5 lines in Workflow.__call__ plus small postprocess adjustments. Also removed unused EXTRACT_PROMPT from prompt_custom and replaced with new prompt name.

9.modification: modify: add one additional focused extraction step that asks Custom to output a short normalized candidate limited to names or single tokens (NAME_EXTRACT_PROMPT) and include it into ensemble; also tighten final normalization to prefer exact token matches; changes limited to adding one Custom call and minor postprocess lines (<=5 lines changed)
